author: cnbc.com
title: Packaging Corporation of America Schedules Conference Call to Discuss First Quarter 2018 Operating Results
text:
LAKE FOREST, Ill.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Packaging Corporation of America (NYSE: PKG) will hold a conference call on Wednesday, April 25, 2018 at 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time (8:00am Central) to discuss First Quarter 2018 results. The first quarter earnings results will be released after the market closes on Tuesday, April 24, 2018.
To access the conference call on April 25th, please dial (855) 730-0288 (U.S. and Canada) or (832) 412-2295 (International) by 8:45 a.m. (Eastern Time). The conference call leader will be Mark Kowlzan.
A replay of the call will also be available from 12:00 p.m. (Eastern Time) on April 25, 2018 until 11:59 p.m. (Eastern Time) on May 9, 2018. To access the recording, please dial (855) 859-2056 (U.S. and Canada) or (404) 537-3406 (International). The passcode is 4539018.
This call will also be webcast and accessible at PCAâ€™s website at www.packagingcorp.com .
PCA is the fourth largest producer of containerboard products and the third largest producer of uncoated freesheet paper in North America, based on production capacity. PCA operates eight paper mills and 94 corrugated products plants and related facilities.
